Title: Infiltration: Spy Within the Kingdom
Credits2: StoryGraph framework created by Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu).

ForestEdge.Body: You stand at the edge of the enemy kingdom's forest. To the east lies a small village. To the west, an old SpyglassTower looms.

Village.Body: The village is quiet, but you notice a blacksmithâ€™s shop nearby and a small path leading toward a guarded gate.

SpyglassTower.Body: In the old tower, you discover a dusty spyglass mounted on a stand. Through it, you see the guards' patrol pattern and a hidden path to the castle rooftops. You also hear someone say a codeword: 'Nightfall'.

Blacksmith.Body: The blacksmith eyes you suspiciously, then discreetly hands you a guard uniform. 'This should help you reach the castle. Good luck.'

CastleGate.Body: The towering castle gate blocks your path. Two guards stand watch. Without a uniform, you will be turned away.

SideGate.Body: A narrow path leads to a small side gate. A suspicious guard blocks the way. 'What's the codeword?' he asks.

Courtyard.Body: You've passed the guards and entered the castle courtyard. From here, you can sneak into various parts of the castle.

RooftopEntry.Body: You're now on the castle rooftops. From here, you can find another way inside, unseen.

EnemyWarRoom.Body: In the war room, you find a scroll and documents detailing the enemy's plans. With this information, your kingdom might be saved.

ArchiveRoom.Body: Stacks of papers and maps line the walls. Perhaps there is more to find here later.

EscapeTunnel.Body: You sneak into a dark tunnel beneath the castle and emerge safely outside the walls.

ForestEdgeAfterMission.Body: You've returned to the forest's edge with the enemy's plans. You have completed yout mission. Now you must return home to deliver the intel.

Victory.Body: You return home and deliver the plans. Thanks to your bravery, your kingdom is prepared. The war is delayed for now...mission complete.
